title: 安装mod后无法开服
author: 勇者之鹰
txt_content:
安装“自动备份”模组后报错，无法开服




360截图1649121687106103.png (13.28 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2020-6-1 17:07 上传





其他模组都是可以正常运行的
控制台显示：
[[new_server_6000000@app]#  
[MCSMANAGER] -------------------------------------------------------------- 
[MCSMANAGER] [ 2020/5/1 17:8:43 ]: 服务端 new_server_6000000 执行开启命令. 
[MCSMANAGER] -------------------------------------------------------------- 
[17:08:47] [main/INFO]: Loading for game Minecraft 1.14.4
[17:08:47] [main/FATAL]: A critical error occurred
net.fabricmc.loader.discovery.ModResolutionException: Errors were found!
 - Mod mirror depends on mod {fabric @ }, which is missing!
        at net.fabricmc.loader.discovery.ModResolver.findCompatibleSet(ModResolver.java:308) ~[fabric-server-launch.jar:?]
        at net.fabricmc.loader.discovery.ModResolver.resolve(ModResolver.java:602) ~[fabric-server-launch.jar:?]
        at net.fabricmc.loader.FabricLoader.setup(FabricLoader.java:179) ~[fabric-server-launch.jar:?]
        at net.fabricmc.loader.FabricLoader.load(FabricLoader.java:169) [fabric-server-launch.jar:?]
        at net.fabricmc.loader.launch.knot.Knot.init(Knot.java:127) [fabric-server-launch.jar:?]
        at net.fabricmc.loader.launch.knot.KnotServer.main(KnotServer.java:26) [fabric-server-launch.jar:?]
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method) ~[?:1.8.0_241]
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_241]
        at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_241]
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_241]
        at net.fabricmc.loader.launch.server.FabricServerLauncher.launch(FabricServerLauncher.java:61) [fabric-server-launch.jar:?]
        at net.fabricmc.loader.launch.server.FabricServerLauncher.setup(FabricServerLauncher.java:105) [fabric-server-launch.jar:?]
        at net.fabricmc.loader.launch.server.FabricServerLauncher.main(FabricServerLauncher.java:49) [fabric-server-launch.jar:?]
[MCSMANAGER] -------------------------------------------------------------- 
[MCSMANAGER] [ 2020/5/1 17:8:47 ]: 服务端 new_server_6000000 关闭. 
[MCSMANAGER] --------------------------------------------------------------

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
安装 fabric api



fabric-api-0.8.2+build.252-1.14.jar
(490.39 KB, 下载次数: 1)



2020-6-1 17:12 上传
点击文件名下载附件

replies.author: Jesenv5
replies.txt_content:
你这个错误显示你确实fabric的api 应该是这些mod都是依赖于fabric的。
需要安装到你的服务端上

replies.author: 勇者之鹰
replies.txt_content:
もぺもぺ 发表于 2020-6-1 17:09
安装 fabric api
尴尬尴尬，忘记搞最佳答案了，现在才想起来，抱歉
